name: Ice beats Fire
description:
ICE BEATS FIRE PROVE ME WRONG! (☞ﾟヮﾟ)☞  Pitch  ☜(ﾟヮﾟ☜

Welcome to an elemental version of Space Invaders !

✔ How To Play ✔
  • You have 3 types of spaceships : Fire (red), Ice (blue), Grass (green). Each ship has an indication of which weapon you're using
  • It's a simple : Red beats Green ; Green beats Blue ; Blue beats Red
🔧 Controls 🔧 Movement : 🠔 🠖                              Shooting :  Spacebar             Tip : You can shoot sideways if you time it right :)

Credits :

Karl Fayeton / OXONarbonne

Luka Dzneladze
